entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
